system.sustained: Warlock selects target and makes Focus Power Test, firing surge of psychic power that engulfs an area around target of radius 1m x Psy Rating + 1m per Two Degrees of Success on Focu Power Test. This attack can be dodged as an area of effect ranged attack. Those who fail to dodge suffer 2d10 + Psy Rating Energy Damage with Psy Rating Penetration.
